ygData.subject: Re: Guk Raid on National Day
ygData.msgSnippet: well... the thing about JBOOTs is that it gives something like SOW but slightly less 2/3 of it i heard... and it got unlimied charges... so its permanent
ygData.messageBody:
well... the thing about JBOOTs is that it gives something like SOW but
slightly less 2/3 of it i heard... and it got unlimied charges... so its
permanent effect... and bcos necros use DOT and only DOT for killing... with
the help of JBOOTs... we can kite things easily... if u wonder how many
necros managed to do kiting to kill a SG... thats how... hehee.. thast y its
the most impt thing on my list... BUT the bad thing bout it is that its NO
DROP and NO TRADE... so i have to be there to loot the thing...

yes INT items are useful to me as well... but they will be of lower priority
as compared to JBOOTs... although the outlook of the character is important
(FBR n stuff)... hehee...
as far as other attributes are concern... i think they do play a part... at
this point i might wanna ask u if u wanna restart... hehee... i know its a
pain... but its good to have ya dream char... n its still not too late for u
to restart... i know that WIZ use STA and INT as their main... having heard
that high STA actually helps u to regain mana faster... dunno how true... n
if they r the main things... they will play a part in ya char... i suppose
its the spells that relies on them or something... so i gave 100 DEX and 120
INT to my necro... and so far im still quite happy with it...

just what i thought...
Nicademous
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 2:50 PM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Guk Raid on National Day


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Why JBoot is so impt? I thot it got something close to SoW but with
> charges right? If I'm not wrong, EQ is now trying to reduce higher-lvl
> player loot stuffs for lower lvl players. Eg for Observer staff, when u
> 1st loot it, it got 1-49 charges of sentienl(?) effect but once u pass it
> to someone (give or sell), it will automatically reduce to one charge. So
> if that Fboot got charges (and if this reducing charge thingy affect it),
> it's not very useful liao, correct?
>
> To me, the most impt is those artifact tat give me INT (remember I said I
> only pump my INT by 5 point when I create char? sigh), DEX and AGI. The
> rest not so impt to me, AC also kinda useless. Best is to have a2HB weap
> with some unlimited dam spell effect (not charges, small dam also shiok).
> Knn like tat Stormblade, got unlimited lvl 49 spell effect, who stil
wanna
> be casters? ;(
>
> Ziltus
>
> On Thursday, 05 August, 1999 12:12 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >
> > i think its fair that some guys will get some stuff..... just say b4
hand
> > wat stuff u expecting n what not... its not nice to see us fighting
among
> > ourselves just bcos of stuff.... personally... everything got INT n DEX
> will
> > be good for me... but i dont really mind not having them... the most
> > important thing for me... is... JBOOTs... (BUT that is not in GUK)...
> >
> > Nicademous

sigh.
